actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 35 of title 44, United States Code, to require an annual justification for the continued use of any form used to solicit information from private persons and State and local government agencies.

summary.text: Zero- Base Paperwork Act - Requires an annual justification for the continued use of any form used to solicit information from private sources and State and local government agencies.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 35 of title 44, United States Code, to require an annual justification for the continued use of any form used to solicit information from private persons and State and local government agencies.
